instructions.summaryBody1: Practise routine online banking tasks inside a touch-style interface.
instructions.summaryBody2: Select the mobile or tablet frame, then explore the tabs to manage balances, transfers, bills, cards, and security. If a step is missed, the prompt bar will explain what to do next so you can self-correct.

debit.title: Set up a new direct debit / standing order
debit.name: Name

limits.title: Set spending limits
limits.helper: Adjust how much can be spent on the card before a manual review is needed.

tasks.title: Today's practice
tasks.helper: Work through each activity inside the simulator. Items tick themselves when you complete the matching action.

checkBalances.title: Check balances
checkBalances.helper: Refresh the Accounts tab to confirm your current, savings, and linked totals.

recurringPayment.title: Set up a recurring payment
recurringPayment.helper: Use bill payments or mandates to schedule an automatic outgoing payment.

sendExternal.title: Send money to other people or accounts
sendExternal.helper: Complete the send money form with a recipient and delivery method.

transferOwn.title: Transfer money between your own accounts
transferOwn.helper: Move funds internally using the transfer form.

changePin.title: Change your PIN
changePin.helper: Submit matching four-digit PIN entries in the security tab.

setLimits.title: Set spending limits
setLimits.helper: Adjust the daily and contactless card limits in the security tools.

clinician.title: Clinician comments
clinician.helper: Use this space to record observations, cueing strategies, or follow-up goals after the session.
clinician.placeholder: Enter any notes relevant to this session...

prompts.ready: Ready when you are. Choose a task to begin.

switched.next: Scroll down to review the latest transactions.

reset.next: Work back through each activity inside the simulator.

reinstate.next: Monitor the next collection date in the direct debits list.

cancel.next: Confirm with the provider if an alternative payment is needed.

resume.next: Check your calendar reminder to avoid duplicates.

pause.next: Set a manual reminder if you still need to pay this manually.

limits.updatedNext: Changes apply straight away to in-store and contactless transactions.

refresh.success: Balances refreshed. Everything is up to date.

transfer.next: Review the transaction history to confirm both entries.

bill.onceNext: Check the transactions list to see it marked as paid.
bill.recurringNext: Review the mandates panel to confirm the new recurring payment.

next.bacs: Expect the funds to clear in 2‚Äì3 working days.
next.chaps: Stay available for the confirmation call before the cut-off time.
next.standard: Share the confirmation with the recipient if needed.

mandate.manageNext: You can manage it from the list to pause or cancel later.

view.next: Continue practising tasks inside the simulated device.

tab.accountsNext: Review balances or export a statement.
tab.paymentsNext: Choose a form to set up transfers or bill payments.
tab.securityNext: Lock cards or manage security options.

pin.updatedNext: Remember to memorise it and destroy any written notes.

card.lockedNext: If the card is found later, return to unlock it before use.
card.unlockedNext: You can continue using the card immediately.
card.requestedNext: Watch your messages for confirmation of the delivery date.

export.sessionCsvNext: Share the log or keep it for your records.
export.csvNext: Open it in Excel or your spreadsheet tool for review.
export.pdfNext: Open it to review or share as needed.

timeline.clearedNext: Continue practising and new actions will appear here.

transactions.updatedNext: Scroll to see the selected account history.

limits.dailyRange: Set a daily limit between ¬£100 and ¬£5,000.
limits.dailyRangeNext: Adjust the daily amount, then press "Update limits".
limits.contactlessRange: Contactless limit must be between ¬£10 and ¬£500.
limits.contactlessRangeNext: Amend the contactless amount before saving.
limits.order: Contactless limit cannot be higher than the daily limit.
limits.orderNext: Lower the contactless limit or raise the daily cap first.

transfer.missingAccounts: Choose both a source and destination account.
transfer.missingAccountsNext: Select different accounts from the dropdowns.
transfer.sameAccount: You selected the same account for both fields.
transfer.sameAccountNext: Change one of the dropdowns so the money has somewhere to go.
transfer.amount: Enter a transfer amount greater than zero.
transfer.amountNext: Type the amount you want to move, then press "Transfer now".
transfer.balance: Insufficient funds in the selected source account.
transfer.balanceNext: Reduce the amount or pick an account with enough balance.

bill.incomplete: Complete all bill payment fields first.
bill.incompleteNext: Pick an account, payee, and amount before confirming.
bill.balance: The account does not have enough funds for this bill.
bill.balanceNext: Adjust the amount or transfer funds in before paying.

send.incomplete: Fill in the account, recipient, and amount fields.
send.incompleteNext: Complete the missing fields, then try sending again.
send.balanceNext: Transfer money in or lower the amount before resubmitting.

mandate.incomplete: All fields are required to set up an instruction.
mandate.incompleteNext: Enter the organisation, amount, and schedule before saving.

pin.format: PIN must be exactly four digits.
pin.formatNext: Enter four numbers (0-9) with no spaces.
pin.match: The PIN entries do not match.
pin.matchNext: Re-enter the same digits in both boxes.

card.reason: Select a reason for the replacement card.
card.reasonNext: Use the dropdown to explain why you need the new card.

export.accountNext: Tap a balance card, then try exporting again.

limits.updated: Updated spending limits to {daily} daily / {contactless} contactless

transactions.empty: No transactions yet ‚Äî create one via transfers or payments.
